Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel for visiting Paris”
Reviews.Author: Razzor9000
Reviews.Content: location near opera 3 metro stations lot restaurants hotel nice beautiful looked exactly breakfast included staff friendly definetly recommend hotel visit paris

Reviews.Title: “OK- nice room, quiet but awful breakfast”
Reviews.Author: RMPS01
Reviews.Content: ok nice quiet awful breakfast liked lots privacy hotel hard middle lots little streets nice staff nice reception cute disgusting breakfast sausages bacon pancakes eggs toasted boring yoghurts salami pastries wouldnt wouldnt discourage unless love breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Convenience and luxury”
Reviews.Author: Penny G
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel sydney opera seven nights october 2011 following weeks europe apprehensive staying name brand hotel rome couldnt pleasantly surprised modern exceptionally clean size plenty space suitcases lots cupboards bathroom compared bath windows overlooking street left night allow fresh air surprised pleased electric jug allowed cups tea coffee luxury european hotels continental breakfast amongst experience entire stay staff friendly helpful hotel centrally located enabling walk major attractions five minute walk railway station five minute walk hopon hopoff bus five minute walk shopping weve seen truly enjoyed stay wonderful hotel definitely stay opportunity arise

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for money paid.”
Reviews.Author: Eugene K
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights october 2011 pleasantly surprised location close metro walking distance louvre champs elysee roissy airport bus stop 500 metres reception staff friendly helpful didnt charge water mini bar didnt change sufficient bathroom toilet bit dated fine little temperature bit low breakfast hotel lobby service staff polite quick tables limited

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Geanne_54
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights hotel located walking distance main attractions stores boulevard haussman bright spotlessly clean buffet breakfast included baguettes croissants selection cheeses jams yogurts fruit salad eggs custard computer lobby lots newspapers magazines guests read front desk staff polite helpful definitely recommend chinese restaurant galeries lafayette nearby

Reviews.Title: “Great accommodation”
Reviews.Author: oldbluebagfaithful
Reviews.Content: hotel located central paris close tourist sites stayed 307 appeared recently renovated condition spacious paris standards king size bed bathroom separate toilet window flower box french serviced daily staff front desk anna daisy extremely helpful directions advice recommend hotel definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Thoroughly recommended”
Reviews.Author: saintgerry
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights complaints girls front desk excellent location cleaned everyday breakfast buffet style metro station couple minutes walk restuarants nearby found little chinese restuarant rue serves fantastic meals decent prices

Reviews.Title: “Good Location and Spacious”

Reviews.Content: spouse travelled paris moved versailles central paris accomodation versailles welcome able spacious hotel strategically located gallery lafayette round corner clean breakfast nice spread paris standard
